aboutme.title: Experience
aboutme.details:
• Solar Power Outlet, Mel (2022 - 2023)

    Upgraded and maintained the warehouse management system, ensuring efficient and accurate tracking of inventory and shipments.

    Migrated sub-systems to React framework and implemented enhanced UI features for improved user experience.

  • Space Star, Beijing (2015-2017)

    Designed and developed the company website from scratch. Conducted thorough testing of front-end code to ensure cross-browser compatibility. Worked closely with UI/UX designers to integrate various website features such as icons and banners.

aboutme.title: Core Competencies
aboutme.details:
• High-level analytical and problem-solving skills, Skilled at troubleshooting and debugging issues.
  • Possess a knack for teamwork, effective communication skills and am comfortable working cross-functional.
  • Demonstrated ability in managing time effectively by prioritizing tasks to meet deadlines.

aboutme.title: Education & Certificates
aboutme.details:
• Master of Communication Engineering Harbin Institute of Technology, China (2006-2008)
  • Bachelor of Electronic Information Engineering Harbin Engineering University, China (2002-2006)
  • AWS Cloud Practitioner, Amazon (2023)
  • Jira Fundamentals Badge, Atlassian (2022)
  • React Development General Assembly (2022)
